DOC.brief_summary: The effect of weight loss with long-term low calorie diet (LCD) on plasma metabolites is unknown. The aim was to examine whether a LCD-induced weight reduction results in changes in the extended plasma metabolites.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Long Term Calorie Restriction on Sphingomyelin and Amino Acids
DOC.detailed_description: Overweight/obese subjects (25â‰¤ BMI <33 kg/m2) aged 40 to 59 years consumed a LCD (an approximate 100 kcal/day calorie deficit) or a weight-maintenance diet (control) in a randomized, controlled design with 3-year intervention period.
DOC.criteria: 25 <= BMI < 33 kg/m2 type 2 diabetes cardiovascular disease psychiatric problems any medication use
